page.title: 02SOMERSHAM GARAGE
page.content: There has been a garage on this spot for fourteen years,but there was a change of owner after eleven years.It had a wire across the drive and when a car drives over it,it rings a bell to ask for service.There were lots of gas cylinders for welding. They did MOT's (to check if cars are roadworthy) if the car is not,it must be taken off the road until it is repaired. A hydraulic elevator is used to hoist the car so work may be carried out beneath it.A garage is also used to get the cars fuel,usually petrol.In the garage was an office which you paid for the petrol and could buy oils and other accessories for the car. The employers were two proffessional mechanics,two pump attendants,and one boss,the one in charge.
